wblut.hemesh

Class HE_Halfedge

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Element
      • wblut.hemesh.HE_Halfedge

  • public class HE_Halfedge
extends HE_Element
    Half-edge element of half-edge data structure.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
